content: esme s winter cottage is the calm after the storm that was sophie s universe 1 the square is 12 but if you can alter the size slightly by using a thicker/thinner yarn and a bigger/smaller hook photo tutorials are provided for the tricky rounds so although this pattern is intermediate i am going out on a limb and saying that it is suitable for adventurous beginners enjoy and please remember to share photos of your completed squares dedri 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sophies-universe-cal
